title: Mineral Wool Market Expected Value Up to $12.0 Billion by 2019
content: Pune, India -- (SBWIRE) -- 09/18/2015 -- The report "Mineral Wool Market by Application (Building & Construction, Industrial & Appliances, Transportation, and Others) & Regional Analysis (North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific and Row) - Trends & Forecasts To 2019", defines and segments the mineral wool market with an analysis and forecast of the market size by volume and value. The mineral wool market size in terms of value is projected to reach $12 billion by 2019, at an approximate CAGR of 7.0% between 2014 and 2
